author: wrowe
msg: Solve C-L post body reads from the HTTP_IN by ap_get_brigade() so that
we know -immediately- that we've read the last of the data.  This patch
adds an EOS bucket to the brigade if ctx->remaining has been consumed.

author: rbb
msg: Add some debugging logic to perchild.  This is almost working now, we just
aren't popping out of apr_poll if there is data on the Unix Domain Socket.
Once that is fixed, this MPM _should_ work again.

author: rbb
msg: Get the prefork MPM using the apr_poll interface directly instead of going
through the old functions which are only still available for backwards

author: ianh
msg: (fix function defs to match updated version (.40) of apache)

author: trawick
msg: Get proxy ftp to work over IPv6.
